Things to Do
Activities
Facilities
Events
Events
DINNERS:
To attend dinners, tickets are needed. Homeowners only can purchase up to four (4) tickets, with four (4) Homeowners membership cards on the 1st day of sale. Renters and Homeowners’ guest(s) can purchase on the 2nd day of sale. Tickets are sold in Phase II, 8:00 – 10:00 am. NOTE: Please bring your own plates and silverware to the dinners.
PICNICS:
All park picnics are for Men’s Club members and guests. Tickets must be purchased in advance. Single ladies can purchase a ticket. Each person or couple attending is expected to bring silverware, and table & chairs. The Men’s Club will supply glasses or cups, beer, soda, meat, coffee, water and plates.
DANCES:
These are held monthly during the winter months. See park newsletter for details each month. Tickets are needed.
TOURS
:
Various out of park tours (cruises & day trips) are available to park residents & guests. See Phase I bulletin board for details and sign up sheets.
PHOTO SHARING
A very special Thank you to Lynn Leonard for the photos!
​VALENTINES DAY 2024​

PICNICS:
All park picnics are for Men’s Club members and guests. Tickets must be purchased in advance. Single ladies can purchase a ticket. Each person or couple attending is expected to bring silverware, and table & chairs. The Men’s Club will supply glasses or cups, beer, soda, meat, coffee, water and plates.

:
Various out of park tours (cruises & day trips) are available to park residents & guests. See Phase I bulletin board for details and sign up sheets.
PHOTO SHARING
A very special Thank you to Lynn Leonard for the photos!

About Us
HOLIDAY PARK PARK AND RECREATION DISTRICT is a community intended and operated as "housing for older persons" located in North Port, FL. The community consists of two phases with 865 home sites.  Phase I was originally built in 1971 and Phase II was built 1 1/2 years later. The community is governed by a 9 member Board of Trustees.
Phase I
Phase I consists of 325 mobile home sites. It has a clubhouse with a heated, ​olympic-size pool and many other amenities.
Phase II
Phase II consists of 540 mobile home sites. It has a club house with a heated pool and several other amenities.

Aerial photo of the amenities in Phase II (tennis, shuffleboard & pickleball)
Photo of digital sign on Tuscola Blvd.

HOLIDAY PARK PARK AND RECREATION DISTRICT is a community intended and operated as "housing for older persons" located in North Port, FL. The community consists of two phases with 865 home sites.  Phase I was originally built in 1971 and Phase II was built 1 1/2 years later. The community is governed by a 9 member Board of Trustees.
Phase I
Phase I consists of 325 mobile home sites. It has a clubhouse with a heated, ​olympic-size pool and many other amenities.
Phase II
Phase II consists of 540 mobile home sites. It has a club house with a heated pool and several other amenities.

Contact Us
We look forward to hearing from you!
Call us at:
(941) 426-1585
Fax:
(941) 423-1084
Our address is:
5401 Holiday Park Blvd., North Port, FL 34287
Office hours are Monday through Friday, 10:00 A.M. to 2:00 P.M.
The Holiday Park office does not deal with the sales and rentals in the park. For sales inquiries, please contact a local real estate agent. For rental inquiries, please use rental search sites available on the internet.
For other matters, use the form below to send a message:

Board Meeting Calendar
Board Meetings
Regular Meetings take place the 2nd Thursday of the month
Workshop Meetings take place the 4th Tuesday of the month
Supporting Documentation reviewed during meetings may be requested at any time by emailing us using the "Contact Us" links on this website. Please allow 24-48 hrs for processing depending on the time of request.
Meetings are LIVE STREAMED on YOU TUBE starting with our October 12th Meeting. Our YOU TUBE Channel is
@holidaypark-parkandrecreation
